notes: 书中提到，“Maps from the 1920s indicate a Muslim cemetery, part of Kampong Damar Darat, where the keramat was situated”，但“The first mention of the keramat is in the Singapore Herald of 14 December 1970 under the title ‘Hilltop Shrine at Jurong the Builders Fear to Move’”（p650）。此处最被提及时间采用Keramat本身被提及时间，也即后者。
